TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TableRowCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public NotInheritable Class TableRowCollection Implements IList
public ref class TableRowCollection sealed : System::Collections::IList
type TableRowCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 封裝 物件的集合，這個物件代表 控制項中的單一資料列。

span.span: Encapsulates a collection of objects that represent a single row in a control.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個類別來以程式設計方式管理集合物件。Use this class to programmatically manage a collection of objects. 這個類別常用來新增或移除資料列從控制項。This class is commonly used to add or remove rows from a control. > [!NOTE] > A控制項包含集合，表示集合物件。A control contains a collection that represents a collection of objects. 每個代表資料表中的個別資料列，並包含集合，表示集合物件。Each represents an individual row in the table and contains a collection that represents a collection of objects. 這些物件代表資料表中的個別儲存格。These objects represent the individual cells in the table. 若要取得個別資料格，您必須先取得從的集合控制項。To get an individual cell, you must first get a from the collection of a control. 您可以取得從的集合。You can then get a from the collection of the . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何以程式設計方式將資料列加入資料表加為代表資料表的資料列的物件透過控制屬性。The following example demonstrates how to programmatically add rows to a table by adding objects, which represent the rows of the table, to the control through the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic TableRowCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TableRowCollection Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic TableRowCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TableRowCollection Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-xml[Classic TableRowCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TableRowCollection Example/Common/source.xml#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，將附加從指定的陣列至集合的物件。Use the method to append the objects from the specified array to the collection. 當您建構資料表時，通常使用這個方法。This method is commonly used when you are constructing a table. 若要建構資料表，請先建立的陣列物件來代表資料表的資料列。To construct a table, first create an array of objects to represent the rows of the table. 接下來，使用方法，將陣列傳遞做為引數，以新增物件加入集合。Next, use the method, passing the array as an argument, to add the objects to the collection.

summary.span: 傳回 實作的物件，包含 中的所有 物件。

span.span: Returns a implemented object that contains all objects within the .

returns.span: 實作物件，包含 內的所有 物件。

span.span: A implemented object that contains all objects within the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來建立實作的物件，可以取得每個項目中透過輕鬆地反覆。Use this method to create a implemented object that can be iterated through easily to get each item in the . 使用屬性取得目前的項目指向集合中。Use the property to get the item currently pointed to in the collection. 使用方法，以移至下一步 的項目集合中。Use the method to move to the next item in the collection. 使用方法，將列舉值移回到初始位置。Use the method to move the enumerator back to the initial position. > [!NOTE] > 建立之後，就必須呼叫方法實作物件，或使用方法，將列舉程式移至集合中第一個項目。The method must be called after creating a implemented object or using the method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection. 項目，否則為表示屬性未定義。Otherwise, the item represented by the property is undefined. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法用來建立實作的物件，會逐一查看資料表中顯示的項目。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to create a implemented object that is iterated through to display the items in the table. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic TableRowCollection.GetEnumerator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TableRowCollection.GetEnumerator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic TableRowCollection.GetEnumerator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TableRowCollection.GetEnumerator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，您應該使用方法來加入項目物件。Typically, you should use the method to add an element to a object. 方法是明確的介面成員實作。The method is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

summary.span: 從集合移除物件。

span.span: Removes an object from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，您應該使用方法來移除項目從物件。Typically, you should use the method to remove an element from a object. 方法是明確的介面成員實作。The method is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
